event.title: SBI PO Recruitment Notification 2018 Online apply
event.description:
SBI PO Recruitment 2018 – SBI has issued Notification for the Recruitment of PO (probationary Officers) .Eligible candidates may apply through Online Apply Application reach on before 13/05/2018 Official Website https://www.sbi.co.in/careers/ Further details of Age, pay Scale, Fee & other details see on below..

Dated: 21-04-2018
SBI PO (probationary Officers)
Important Dates :
Application submission Open date : : 21/04/2018
Application submission last date : : 13/05/2018
Exam Date: : 1 st, 7th & 8th of July 2018
Interview Date : 24.09.2018 to 12.10.2018
About: SBI
Post Name: PO (probationary Officers)
Vacancy Details: 2000 jobs
Type of Apply: Online Apply
Education Qualifications : Graduation in any discipline from a recognised University or any equivalent qualification recognised as such by the Central Government
Age Limit as on : age between Not below 21 years and not above 30 years as on 01.04.2018
as on date 01.04.2018

Age Relaxation
OBC for : 3 years
SC/ST/ : 5 Years
Selection procedure : Online Test , Interview & GD
Fees Payment Mode : online
General for : 600/-
OBC for : 600/-
SC/ST : 100/-
PH for : 100/-
PH for : 100/-

Check Application Form Apply Now Visit official Website Apply Mode : Online Apply: only

How to Apply :through SBI Online Website
Eligible applicants are require to apply through Official Website and fill all respect details of application, Attach scanned copies of latest passport size photograph and signatures be uploaded along with the application form.and registered on before 13/05/2018.
